account_subtitle: Manage your account information and sign out.
community_subtitle: Connect, share, and support your brothers in faith.
community_tooltip_leave_to_create: You must leave your current community to create a new one.
community_tooltip_leave_to_join: You must leave your current community to join another one.
create_circle_subtitle: Start a new space for prayer and support.
create_congregation_desc: Enter the details to create a new community for your church.
delete_account_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and all your data from our servers.
description_placeholder: E.g., Circle to intercede for the Silva family.
display_name_placeholder: Your full name or your church
empty_state_my_circles: You are not yet a member of any prayer circle.
empty_state_public_circles: No public circles available at the moment.
error_circle_load_failed: Failed to load the circle. Try again.
error_circle_not_found_or_member: Circle not found or you are not a member.
feature_bible_reader_desc: The complete Bible in the palm of your hand, with multiple versions and study tools.
feature_characters_desc: Explore detailed profiles of biblical figures, with summaries and key verses.
feature_chat_desc: Get answers to your biblical questions with a trained AI assistant.
feature_community_desc: Connect with your church members, share requests, and support each other.
feature_feeling_journey_desc: A guided journey to help you process your emotions in the light of the Scriptures.
feature_hope_bridge_desc: Create and share pages full of hope and verses with friends going through tough times.
feature_journal_desc: Record your reflections, prayers, and learnings in a personal and safe space.
feature_study_plans_desc: Follow structured study plans on specific topics to deepen your knowledge.
home_welcome_subtitle: Ready for another day of growth in faith?
join_circle_desc_modal: Enter the invite code to join a private prayer circle.
join_congregation_desc: Enter the invite code to join an existing community.
no_congregation_desc: Join an existing community with an invite code or create a new one for your church.
no_congregation_title: You are not part of any congregation
onboarding_circle_desc_1: Create or join public or private prayer groups to focus on specific topics.
onboarding_circle_desc_2: Invite brothers to join forces in intercession for a common goal.
onboarding_circle_desc_3: When the prayer is answered, celebrate the testimony to encourage everyone's faith.
pending_request_desc: You have requested to join the "{{name}}" community. Please wait for an administrator to approve.
preferences_subtitle: Customize your experience with the platform.
press_and_hold_prompt: Press and hold to pray together
privacy_desc: Choose if this circle will be visible to everyone or only to invited members.
private_desc: Only people with the invite code can join.
profile_subtitle: This is how others will see you in the application.
public_desc: Anyone can find and join this circle.
prayer_circles_subtitle: Join with brothers in prayer for common purposes.
settings_subtitle: Customize your profile and app preferences.
title_placeholder: E.g., Prayer for the Silva family.
toast_account_deleted_desc: Your account has been successfully deleted.
toast_already_a_member: You are already a member of this circle.
toast_circle_create_error: An error occurred while creating the prayer circle.
toast_congregation_create_error: An error occurred while creating the congregation.
toast_data_error_desc: We couldn't load your profile data. Please try to log in again.
toast_invalid_invite_code: Invalid invite code or the circle no longer exists.
toast_join_circle_error: An error occurred while trying to join the circle.
toast_join_request_error: An error occurred while processing your request.
toast_join_request_sent: Your request to join "{{name}}" was sent successfully.
toast_not_authenticated: You must be logged in to perform this action.
toast_profile_error_desc: We couldn't save your profile changes.
mission_desc: What is the purpose of this circle? Be clear and concise.
base_verse_desc: Optional: Add a Bible verse to anchor this circle.
